text: Annotations: icon added on PDF preview to show that it contains Annotations.
Improved User Experience: added ability to print items by typing CTRL + P.
Improved User Interface: updated top bar when viewing items.
Revoke Access: performance significantly improved for large folders.
Enhanced Cybersecurity: increased security checks on Rights.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements: we addressed various bugs and made additional enhancements for a better experience.
